text: The 1978 Canadian Open was the fifth edition of the professional invitational snooker tournament, the Canadian Open, which took place from August to September 1978. Cliff Thorburn won the title defeating Tony Meo 17–15 in the final. __TOC__ ==Main draw== ==References== Category:1978 in snooker Category:1979 in snooker Open Open
title: 1978 Canadian Open
